plugin.name: Metafeatures
plugin.author: Elijah Mayfield
plugin.description: Extracts features from additional columns in CSV

plugin.name: Regex Search
plugin.author: Elijah Mayfield
plugin.description: Class to search for regular expressions in text.

plugin.name: Stretch Patterns
plugin.author: Elijah Mayfield
plugin.description: Gets stretchy n-grams from your corpus

plugin.name: WEKA Learning Plugin
plugin.author: Elijah Mayfield
plugin.description: This plugin provides access to the classifiers which are part of the WEKA toolkit.

plugin.name: SVM Light Learning Plugin
plugin.author: Elijah Mayfield
plugin.description: This plugin provides access to SVM light binaries.

plugin.name: Horizontal Comparison Plugin
plugin.author: Elijah Mayfield
plugin.description: Compares features between two cells in a confusion matrix, taking the raw increase in frequency.

plugin.name: Absolute Horizontal Comparison Plugin
plugin.author: Elijah Mayfield
plugin.description: Compares features between two cells in a confusion matrix, taking the absolute difference.
